data.question: Faculties: NIT Trichy or IIIT Trichy?
data.answer: The classes and industrial training for the CSE and ECE Program are handled by faculty members from Mentor Institute, i.e., NIT Trichy, IIIT Trichy, experts from TCS, CTS, Infosys, Ramco Systems, ELCOT, Navitas (Take Solutions), HP, Polaris, and Orzota (Big data analytics group) and resource persons from reputed institutes such as IITs, NITs, IIMs and BIM.
